name: Ally's Notes
description:
Who is Ally?

Who are her parents?

WHY CAN'T I WALK SIDEWAYS??

Listen around to find flowers and discover notes from Jill, They will reveal the truth.

Can you find all the Easter-Eggs?

HEADPHONES REQUIRED

W/S to move

Left mouse - Collect flower

Right Mouse - Open Diary

Escape - Pause/Settings

M - Map
